jobs.title: Senior Python Developer
jobs.job_description:
## About TechInnovate Solutions
TechInnovate Solutions is a leading software development firm specializing in scalable web applications and data platforms. We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Python Developer to join our dynamic team and contribute to our cutting-edge projects.

## Job Responsibilities
* Design, develop, and maintain robust, high-performance web applications using Python and Django/Flask.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
* Implement and manage RESTful APIs for seamless integration with frontend services.
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* Write clean, well-documented, and testable code.
* Participate in code reviews and contribute to architectural discussions.
* Mentor junior developers and foster a collaborative environment.

## Job Requirements
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* **5+ years** of professional experience in Python web development.
* Proficiency in Django or Flask framework.
* Strong understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL).
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.
* Familiarity with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

## Perks & Benefits
* Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
* Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
* Flexible work hours and remote work options (post-probation).
* Professional development opportunities and training budget.
* Generous paid time off.
* Modern office space with amenities.
